question_en: How can I stay updated on official announcements?
answer_en: Listen to radio, follow government SMS alerts, or check official websites and verified social media accounts.

question_en: How can I use the navigation feature?
answer_en: Open the app, go to 'Navigation', and choose your destination. The app shows safe routes and avoids blocked areas.

question_en: Can I use the app offline?
answer_en: Yes! The app is designed to work completely offline. All key features like Q&A, language support, and emergency guidance are offline.

question_en: How do I check if a news message is real or fake?
answer_en: Go to the 'Fake News Detection' section and paste the message. The system verifies it using local fact-check data.

question_en: How can I enable voice input?
answer_en: Tap the microphone icon üéôÔ∏è and speak clearly. The app automatically converts your voice into text.

question_en: How can I change the language?
answer_en: The app automatically detects your language. You can also change it from the settings page.

question_en: What is the fake news detection feature?
answer_en: It allows users to verify the authenticity of viral messages and alerts using AI and verified databases.

question_en: How do I navigate safely during disasters?
answer_en: Use the navigation option to find safe routes to shelters or hospitals based on real-time disaster data.

question_en: Can I check safe zones on the map?
answer_en: Yes, the app highlights safe zones, shelters, and medical camps on the map.

question_en: How can I get alerts about nearby dangers?
answer_en: The app provides offline alerts for flood, fire, or earthquake-prone areas.

question_en: How can I contribute to relief work?
answer_en: You can volunteer through NGOs listed in the app or offer supplies to local shelters.

question_en: Can I translate answers into Telugu or Hindi?
answer_en: Yes! The assistant automatically responds in the detected language of your question.

question_en: How can I check local disaster news?
answer_en: Go to the 'Updates' tab to see official disaster updates and advisories.

question_en: How do I share my location with rescuers?
answer_en: Use the 'Share Location' option in the app to send coordinates to emergency teams.

question_en: What should I do if the navigation is not loading?
answer_en: Check your GPS permissions or restart the app. Offline mode will still show cached safe zones.

question_en: Can I report fake news?
answer_en: Yes. Go to the 'Report' section and submit the message you suspect as fake.

question_en: How can I know which areas are safe now?
answer_en: The navigation map uses local data to mark danger-free zones in green.

question_en: Can I access help materials offline?
answer_en: Yes, emergency procedures, safety tips, and FAQs are stored offline.

question_en: How can I learn first aid?
answer_en: Go to the 'First Aid' section for offline tutorials and step-by-step guidance.

question_en: Can I share this app with others?
answer_en: Yes, you can share the APK or QR code from the app's share section.

question_en: What should I do if the app crashes?
answer_en: Restart the app and ensure you have enough storage. It works offline so no internet is needed.
